ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: I Agree.  I have had similiar experiences when travelling with spellcasters. -Alex
ygData.messageBody:
I Agree. I have had similiar experiences when travelling with spellcasters.

-Alex

> -----Original Message-----
> From: errors-160851-640-candel=pobox.com@onelist.com
> [mailto:errors-160851-640-candel=pobox.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
> CyberGhozt _
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:08 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament
>
>
> From: "CyberGhozt _" <cyberghozt@...>
>
> I have made the journey once from Qeynos to Freeport with a 22
> level wizard
> who had invisibility and the like. It is much better traveling
> with a high
> level spellcaster because you can be bound to highpass hold if
> you die and
> also because they can do invisibility. I have found only one problem with
> this though. I believe Selo's acclerado somehow messes up
> invisibility. When
> we traveled invisible with accelerado invisibility would wear off very
> quickly at times. Often times RIGHT AFTER the wizard cast it.
> This got quite
> annoying and I have died several times from it. I discovered that if you
> just go invisible without the accelerado then the invisibility lasts much
> longer.
